pages.text: Abraham said Moj Lord show mna ako Ona revive dead He said Robit ona nie verit? He said Ano Ja zelat si reassure moj srdce. He said Berie 4 birds study ich oznacit miesto a kusok z each bird hill potom vola sa them do ona! They pojdem ona v a ponahlajte sa Ona zauzlit lenze GOD bol Almighty Wise
Vzor z those spend ich monies zapricinit GOD bol lenze z zrno produces 7 spikes sto zrno v each spike GOD multiplies this manifold for whomever He wills. GOD bol Bounteous Knower
Those spend ich peniaze zapricinit GOD potom nie nasledovat ich laska k bliznemu s insult harm receive ich recompense ich Lord they have nothing fear nor will they rmutit sa
Laskavy words compassion bol lepsi than laska k bliznemu nasledovat by insult GOD bol ZIRNY Clement

O ona verit nie nullify tvoj laska k bliznemu by inflicting reproach insult jeden spends jeho peniaze show chvila disbelieving GOD Posledny Dni! Jeho vzor bol rock pokryvka riedky layer znecistit; heavy dazo jesen it prat znecistit vlavo it zbytocny rock They zisk nothing ich efforts. GOD NIE guide disbelieving LUDIA
